data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lourenco, Wilson R. (2016): A preliminary synopsis on amber scorpions with special reference to Burmite species: an extraordinary development of our knowledge in only 20 years. ZooKeys 600: 75-87, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.600.8913, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.600.8913
